data.job_desc: Work as a Backend developer as a software engineer for the end of the day (EOD) in a fnance program. Help to maintain and build new programs.

detail.desc: Analyse programs that have to be enhanced.
Understanding of the business process and the fow of the program work in the scheduler or service.
Understand how to use Linux, query to search data, and analyze them.
Tried to simplify the program and also make the program more efcient.
